title.narrative: District level Watch Dog Committee Meeting and Mobilization

description.narrative: Regular district-level watch dog committee meetings with key representatives from local authorities, schools and ex-Kamaiya leaders to monitor problems and progress solutions in relation to ex-Kamaiya rights and entitlements, especially in relation to education and livelihoods

participating-org.narrative: Participants from (BASE,WVAF,Mukta Kamaiya Samaj,UNESCO,District Education Office,Land Reform Office,Press and Media ETC) attend the Meeting and mobilisation

activity-date.narrative: District level Watchdog Committee meeting was to conduct for 60 times and district level watch dog committee mobilization was for 45 times.Almost all the meeting and mobilization part is completed and conducted.There is only one time meeting and mobilization remaining to be conducted in every working district.It is planned to conduct in Q4 of final year
